text: I mean to post this earlier today but: <http://www.badwater.com/2016-styr-labs-badwater-135-webcast/?utm_content=buffera2359&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer>
if you’re not familiar: Badwater is a 130 miles through death valley and all the climbing is at the end
Yeah I heard about this! It's insanity
The book “Eat and Run” opens with Scott Jurek face down in the road in a puddle of his own sick in the middle of this race
another long-run thing happening: my coach is trying for the Fastest Known Time on the oregon PCT as we speak: <http://www.oregonpctproject.com/follow-along/>
in order to make it he’ll need to average over 50 miles a day for like 7 days
